EmailTemplate.subject: Expand your reach — showcase your products on Facebook
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Use your BigCommerce catalog to add a Shop section to your Facebook Page and start showcasing your products to more than 1 billion users. Showcase your products on Facebook Add a new Shop section to your Facebook Page Get started <[[https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/Public/Selling-on-Facebook-Shop-Pages]]> Exponentially expand your reach online with Facebook Use your BigCommerce catalog to add a Shop section to your Facebook Page and start showcasing your products to more than 1 billion users. With the Facebook Shop Pages integration, you can:
- Easily send products to Facebook right from the BigCommerce control panel, then organize them into collections - Enjoy the ease of browsing on any device with the mobile-friendly design of the Facebook Shop section - Allow shoppers to click through from Facebook product pages and check out on your site - Track your success with stats on views and click-throughs Get started with Facebook Shop
BigCommerce customers like Josie Maran Cosmetics are already using a Shop section on their Facebook Pages to drive awareness and traffic. See Josie Maran’s Facebook store <[[https://www.facebook.com/josiemarancosmetics/shop?rid=65967011245&rt=9]]>. Get Started now <[[https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/Public/Selling-on-Facebook-Shop-Pages]]>
